climatePledgeFriendly.details: Global Recycled Standard (GRS) verifies the percentage of recycled content and tracks it from the source to the final product.

features: Big is Beautiful - This plus size winter coats for women are made available in different modern and stunning colors. Choose from size 1X to 5X to ensure a custom, comfy, and figure-flattering fit, and show off your classic taste in clothing by sporting this women's zip-up long puffer jacket.

100% Recycled Waterproof Fabric- Our winter jacket for women are made with recycled polyester, which requires far fewer resources than new fibers and generates fewer CO2 emissions. The shell fabric with 3,000mm waterproof rating effectively keeps out light rain. Stay protected no matter where your adventures take you with our warm puffy coat.

Warm & Cozy Plus Size Parka Jacket - Using soft 240 grams of imitation down cotton padding and skin-friendly pongee liner. Made with a pure durable shell, fluffy high quality imitate down cotton , adjustable hood with vegan fur trim and fleece-lined hand pockets. Every detail is exquisitely designed to make you enjoy winter.

Protects Against Wind - This winter parka for women is designed with full front zippers, a button placket and adjustable features, you can customize the fit of your hood, hem, and cuffs to keep you safe from the elements. Get yourself more stylish with the hooded puffer jacket on meanwhile shield against cold air as a thicken snow jacket.

Fashion Jacket That Lasts - Tighten the waist drawstring of the women's long parka for a better, figure-flattering fit. Easy to carry for your different daily activities; Pockets for Everyone - Keep your tablets, sunglasses, wallet, keys, phone, passport, IDs, and gear with you at all times! This padded puffy jacket features several pockets of varying sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best coat I ever bought!
reviews.reviewText: This coat is super warm, fits perfect and has great features like double zipper so you can open from the bottom for room to move or for air, 3 snaps on either side from bottom up to free up your legs so you can sit more comfortably, bend, etc. The material is top quality and I love the fluffy faux fur framing the hood. The hood does zip off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Made Product
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised at how well made this coat is!! The hood is large, but it will certainly keep the cold air from your face. I am 5'3" so the arm length is too long, but was able to turn up the cuff, works fine now.Wish the fur was removable.The temp here is 25 degrees - the coat works!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice coat - warm and feels like quality
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a size up expecting it might run small. I’m very glad I did because it just fit. The coat has a nice feel and has a little bit of weight, but isn’t super heavy so much so that I feel like I can’t move around. The exterior material is clearly wind, and waterproof. The hood is huge, but I like that, because it blocks out the wind and the fur around it helps to block snow from getting in your face. It does, however, limit visibility. The zipper seems to be of good quality, although it was very stiff when I first used it. I gave this four stars rather than five because it has buttons rather than snaps. This in and of itself wouldn’t be an issue except the buttons are sewn on, and they don’t seem to be very durable… I am confident I will lose the button shortly and will therefore need to reinforce them. The inside of the coat is warm and cozy And the cuffs are adjustable which is nice. They have the elastic band and the adjustable wind proof exterior so all in all the fit is small so definitely order up at least one size I am 5 ft 4 1/2 and weigh 275 pounds I typically wear a 3X or a size 22/24. I ordered this coat in a 4X and while it fits, I won’t be wearing any hoodies or thick sweaters underneath it . Not really a concern because I could wear a tank top underneath this thing and it will keep me warm. Lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat. It's warm with weighing you down. Wonderful quality without and outrageous price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This coat is so nice!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely loved this coat. Very warm too. But had to return it because it ran small. Darn it! I would have kept the coat if it was a little bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This coat is super warm! Very good buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a very hard time finding jackets for the winter and this is so warm and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice warm coat, but it runs very large and it’s to bulky. You get hot too fast
